DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH : BUNDESBANK REJECTS FORCED RATE CUTS
DOC.TEXT: Germany ' s central_bank said it will not be forced to ease monetary policy for the sake of the economy , but some analysts see a good chance that German interest_rates will come_down this week . In its report for the month of January , the bank said it will continue to use carefully any scope for interest_rate changes that emerges from economic and monetary developments . The bank ' s central council is_due to meet Thursday in a regular session to review policy , including interest_rate levels .
